title: Dread Tomb
description:
Dread Tomb is a multiplayer cooperative horror game based on Chinese folk rumors. The archaeology professor noticed an inconspicuous slate map while conducting cultural relic identification work, and thus discovered clues to the ancient tomb of the Southwest King that had been lost in the past. I Am Legion: Stand Survivors
In order to explore the lost treasure of the Southwest King, the professor established a special archaeological team and organized a group of talented individuals with some knowledge of feng shui as members to assist in exploring ancient tombs , retrieving cultural relics, and exchanging them for honorary medals. As exploration deepens, team members will also encounter a series of bizarre and unexpected events.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960(4GB) or AMD Radeon R9 380 (4GB)
